question: I was wondering if its allowed to trim or shave part of your beard just under the top portion of the cheeks to shape the beard.
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
The beard is that which grows on the Jaw bone. It is permissible to remove
the hair from the cheeks.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best
